mapper.select: SELECT rm.id, member1.nickname AS reporterNickname, member1.id AS reporterId, meeting.title AS meetingTitle, member2.nickname AS writerNickname, member2.id AS writerId, mrt.type AS reportType, rm.processedAt FROM reportedMeeting as rm JOIN member as member1 ON rm.reporterId = member1.id JOIN meeting ON rm.meetingId = meeting.id JOIN member as member2 on meeting.regMemberId = member2.id JOIN meetingReportType as mrt on rm.typeId = mrt.id LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
